getStartingNode

public java.lang.String getStartingNode()
Returns this Windows Active Directory input's starting location in the directory path. Null if not specified. If not specified, the the root of the directory tree is used.

Returns:
this Windows Active Directory input's starting location in the directory path.

getTargetDc

public java.lang.String getTargetDc()
Returns the fully qualified domain name of a valid, network accessible Domain Controller. Null if not specified. If not specified, the local machine is used.

Returns:
The fully qualified domain name.
